Description: Sandal for the right foot, made of plaited reed and palm leaves and papyrus, with pointed toe, with ankle and top strap, one of a pair.
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN405582001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
Bibliographic references: Veldmeijer 2009b / Studies of ancient Egyptian footwear. Technological aspects. Part XII. Fibre shoes (106)
